q6.question: What is the duty of the leader of the herd?
q6.answer: ['The leader protects the weaker horses from wild animals and other dangers']
q6.recall: The duty of the leader of the herd is to protect and guide the other horses, as shown when Spirit's mother urges the herd to flee while he is being chased by the men.
q6.vectordb: The duty of the leader of the herd is to lead and protect the other horses. The leader, in this case, is Spirit, a young stallion who takes on the responsibility of leading the Cimarron herd and protecting them from danger. He demonstrates his duty by saving two foals from a cougar attack and making sure the herd is safe when he is captured by humans. He also shows leadership by defying the efforts of the army to brand, shoe, and break him. Spirit's duty as the leader of the herd is to ensure the safety and well-being of his fellow horses.
q6.hybrid: The duty of the leader of the herd is to lead and protect the other horses.
